price: 103. Wana ezali solo elembo na oyo akobanga etumbu ya mokolo ya suka. Mokolo moye bato bakosanganaka, mpe mokolo wana nde ekotatolama.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّمَنۡ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّجۡمُوعٞ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّشۡهُودٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan liman khāfa ʿadhāba al-ākhirati dhālika yawmun majmūʿun lahu al-nāsu wadhālika yawmun mashhūdun
